TopicTitle: The Arcadia series and the Zeus Ships

Articles.Content:
I want to upload pics of my ships and offer them to everyone. PM me and ill email the ships to you. these require the following mods:

B9 Aerospace

Spitfire

Apollo11

Each ship is easy to takeoff, except the Zeus. All of them need to be refueled as soon as they reach orbit. They are for passengers and cargo. I haven't flown them to Duna, but I did a Test burn with the Arcadia 1 and 2: Both of them can make it to Duna I think when they have been refueled.

Have fun with these if you do want them. They look good, work well and are very handy for people who can't quite make a good shuttle or orbital cargo delivery.

Edited October 11, 2014 by Wyre311
I did not add ladders to these for eva on planets.. Be sure to add them if that is what you are using them for
Update: Added ladders for surface EVA, confirmed that these ships can fly to Duna after orbital refuel.
